name: Golden Temple
description: A safe haven for the people of Tsushima, surrounded by golden ginkgo trees.

name: Castle Kaneda
description: The first major stronghold Jin must liberate to rescue Lord Shimura.

name: Castle Shimura
description: The seat of power effectively governing Tsushima. Investigating it is a turning point.

name: Hiyoshi Springs
description: Reflect on peace. 'Steam rises slowly / Warmth embraces weary bones / Rest for the spirit'

name: Ariake Haiku
description: Reflect on refuge. 'Safe from the outside / Walls protect the soft heart / Quiet observation'

name: Komatsu Forge
description: A town famous for its iron and master swordsmiths.

name: Arrow Peak Shrine
description: Located high atop a misty peak. Grants the Charm of Inari.

name: Stone Dragon Shrine
description: A shrine fortified by the sea. Requires a grapple hook to access.

name: Spring Falls Shrine
description: A serene shrine overlooking a massive waterfall system.

name: Mount Jogaku
description: The frozen peaks of the north. Home to a secret technique.

name: Kushine Haiku
description: Reflect on perseverance. 'Bending with the wind / Roots deep in the frozen earth / Life finds a true way'

name: Various Fox Dens
description: Follow the sacred foxes to Inari Shrines to increase your resolve.

name: Pillars of Honor
description: Monuments to fallen samurai. Collect Sword Kits here.
